name: Elderflower Ice Cream
description:
This is a relatively popular ice cream combo in Northern Europe, elderflower has been used here for decades (centuries maybe?), mainly as a spice to cover up the offnotes in moonshine, but it has also made its way in to ice creams, cordials and candy.

You might call this a lazy mix, and indeed it is. But as the vanilla is a main component here, there is no better vanilla ice cream base than the one by @eyemakepizza. It's elegant and tasty, and by adding the elderflower it gives a new interesting dimension to that rich vanilla yummyness.

**FLV Elderflower** is an amazing flavor that works well with both creams and fruits.
author: staybert

reviews.text: You might call this a lazy review, and it is, but mixing a flavor with the Trinity is a great way to either show it off or take it for a spin. The FLV Elderflower here definitely tastes like it’s very much in the showing off category. I’ve never had Elderflower ice cream, but if I did, I would hope it would taste something like this.

This may just be 1% FLV Elderflower added to @eyemakepizza's ice cream base, but it completely transforms the base. The elderflower pairs so well with the vanilla ice cream that I was shocked when I first vaped this. It may be my new favorite ice cream vape. Great job on this one!
